
# About the project

The course is a very good way to learn about open science, open data, and open research tools. There will be chances to utilize advanced statistical methods for visualizing and analyzing data sets.

Free and open software tools are used throughout the course to apply principle of *reproducible research* for its practical purposes.

Here is the [link](https://github.com/phuongfi91/IODS-project) to my GitHub project.
